name: audiobookbay-automated-js-tests
description: JavaScript test suite for UI filtering logic.

scripts.copy-vendor: mkdir -p app/static/vendor/js && mkdir -p app/static/vendor/css && cp node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.js app/static/vendor/js/flatpickr.min.js && cp node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.css app/static/vendor/css/flatpickr.min.css && cp node_modules/nouislider/distribute/nouislider.min.js app/static/vendor/js/nouislider.min.js && cp node_modules/nouislider/distribute/nouislider.min.css app/static/vendor/css/nouislider.min.css
